title: RIot Stalin
body:
So I recieved this email today about a suspention that was apparently warrented. 
***

To
me
Today at 6:21 PM
Greetings tomjashroom,

Actions that have been performed on your account are in violation of the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can review these terms at http://www.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Thu Mar 19 00:21:35 PDT 2015

If you have any questions, contact our Player Support team at https://support.leagueoflegends.com/home

Riot Games Player Support***

Notice the amazing Detail they went into explaining what type of suspention this was and why it happened. Retroactive or random banning isnt cool. Fuck you Riot.

 For all I know I could have been hacked and had jihadi John on my account and got me banned but no you cant add any details. Also if it was a tribunal ban fuck your tribunal. 

Guess Ill wait out the 2 weeks of apparent punishment (as far as im concerened I havent been proven to have done anything wrong). I sent an email to the player support people, no response ofc .

Also, if you try logging into League, doesn't it tell you why you were banned?
